mapper.sql: SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID serviceLinkmanId, SERVICE_ID serviceId, LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, IS_DELETE isDelete, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, IS_HEAD isHead, AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag, PRACTISE_DATE practiseDate

serviceLinkman.SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID serviceLinkmanId, serviceLinkman.SERVICE_ID serviceId, serviceLinkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, serviceLinkman.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, serviceLinkman.IS_DELETE isDelete, serviceLinkman.CREATER creater, serviceLinkman.CREATE_TIME createTime, serviceLinkman.IS_HEAD isHead, serviceLinkman.AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag, serviceLinkman.PRACTISE_DATE practiseDate

linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, linkman.LINKMAN_TYPE linkmanType, linkman.LINKMAN_CATE linkmanCate, linkman.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, linkman.LINKMAN_ADDR linkmanAddr, linkman.LINKMAN_OFFICE_PHON linkmanOfficePhon, linkman.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE linkmanMobilePhone, linkman.LINKMAN_FAX linkmanFax, linkman.LINKMAN_MAIL linkmanMail, linkman.LINKMAN_CERT_NO linkmanCertNo, linkman.IS_ACTIVE isActive, linkman.IS_DELETED isDeleted, linkman.LINKMAN_MEMO linkmanMemo, linkman.CREATER creater, linkman.CREATE_TIME createTime, linkman.MODIFIER modifier, linkman.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, linkman.LOGIN_NAME loginName, linkman.LOGIN_PWD loginPwd
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_IM_SERVICE_LINKMAN where SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETE = '0'

select
,service.SERVICE_NAME,servicelinkman.IS_HEAD,servicelinkman.AUDIT_FLAG from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_linkman servicelinkman on linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = servicelinkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service service on service.SERVICE_ID = servicelinkman.SERVICE_ID where servicelinkman.SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId}
mapper.update:
update AEA_IM_SERVICE_LINKMAN
SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID = #{serviceLinkmanId},
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId},
LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId},
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
IS_HEAD = #{isHead},
AUDIT_FLAG = #{auditFlag},
PRACTISE_DATE = #{practiseDate},
MEMO = #{memo},
AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime},
where SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID = #{serviceLinkmanId}
mapper.select: SELECT ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID 'linkmanInfo.linkmanInfoId', TRIM(ali.LINKMAN_TYPE) 'linkmanInfo.linkmanType', ali.LINKMAN_ADDR 'linkmanInfo.linkmanAddr', ali.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE 'linkmanInfo.linkmanMobilePhone', ali.LINKMAN_MAIL 'linkmanInfo.linkmanMail', ali.LINKMAN_NAME 'linkmanInfo.linkmanName', ali.LINKMAN_CERT_NO 'linkmanInfo.linkmanCertNo', ais.SERVICE_NAME 'service.serviceName', ais.SERVICE_CODE 'service.serviceCode', aui.APPLICANT 'unitInfo.applicant', aui.IDCARD 'unitInfo.idcard', aui.APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE 'unitInfo.applicantDetailSite', aui.IDREPRESENTATIVE 'unitInfo.idrepresentative', aui.IDMOBILE 'unitInfo.idmobile', aui.IDNO 'unitInfo.idno', aui.UNIT_NATURE 'unitInfo.unitNature', aui.REGISTERED_CAPITAL 'unitInfo.registeredCapital', aui.REGISTER_AUTHORITY 'unitInfo.registerAuthority', aui.MANAGEMENT_SCOPE 'unitInfo.managementScope', aisl.IS_HEAD isHead, aisl.AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag, aisl.MEMO memo, aisl.SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID serviceLinkmanId, aisl.PRACTISE_DATE practiseDate, aisl.SERVICE_ID serviceId, aisl.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, aisl.PRACTISE_DATE practiseDate FROM aea_im_service_linkman aisl LEFT JOIN aea_linkman_info ali ON ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = aisl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service ais on ais.SERVICE_ID = aisl.SERVICE_ID LEFT JOIN aea_unit_info aui on aui.UNIT_INFO_ID = aisl.UNIT_INFO_ID WHERE aisl.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aisl.SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID = #{serviceLinkmanId}
